info.name: Stalers Ogame Strip  (SOS)
info.description:
a stript version of ogame, without the ogame 4.x crap and removed all DM related links
at the moment only for ogame.nl
-optimised pages, fleet, resources, shipyard, messages, etc.
-Moons to the right
-removed officers bar
-removed BG image
-removed visable DM links (shop, trader, etc) links are stil there, but i hated the highlighted crap (yellow)
-removed the new boxes in overview came with the 4.x update
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.8
28-04-2012
finaly found a way to only remove the 4.0 boxes in a clean coding way (thank you srazzano)
cleaned some useless codes, for now i`m very pleased with the results :)

Version 1.7
27-04-2012
manage to show the 3 info boxes with building time fleet/resource/building
only its a ugly way of coding, i manage to hide the update 4. smallbox behind the infocompete box
so it works only with the infocompete add-on, if you dont use that, you will see a small empty box
still looking for a nice clean solution, but for now it works :P

version 1.6
26-04-2012
same as 1.5 but with lesser coding

Version 1.5
26-04-2012
all pages are optimised, position change, main image removed, background image removed, mmo bar removed, officers bar removed, moon to right.
still looking for a solution to show only the small boxes for building state info, now i had to remove it al if i wanted to delete all 4.x crap
if you have an solution for that issue let me know, all other commands are welcome!

version 1.2

created and tested by Staler 25-04-2012

this is just the start, some minor bugs are still in it and on the resource page i have a little try-out thinking about to implant that style to the other pages (fleet, defense, etc)
